original_text: You people who live far away, listen to what I have done! You people who are near, understand that I am very strong.’ You people who live far away, listen to what I have done! You people who are near, understand that I am very strong.’ You people who live far away,
korean_text: 너희 먼 데에 있는 자들아 내가 행한 것을 들으라 너희 가까이에 있는 자들아 나의 권능을 알라

sentences.original_text: You people who live far away,
listen to what I have done!
understand that I am very strong.
